name: Panic Lab
description:
Welcome to the Lab! Carefully manoeuvre your way across the platforms to the exits, don't slip or you will fall to a fiery death which will send you back to the previous door you went through.

S.AM is here to help you through giving you tips on what to do, or is he!

There are a total of 3 main levels each harder than the last, then a secret 2 levels which are even more difficult, only gamers will be able to complete the secret levels!
